title: Rams plan to 'Run it Back'; Better Super Bowl pass: Eli vs. Stafford; Eric Weddle
itunes:title: Rams plan to 'Run it Back'; Better Super Bowl pass: Eli vs. Stafford; Eric Weddle
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and Super Bowl Champion Shaun O'Hara react to the Los Angeles Rams Super Bowl parade and discuss the Rams chances to win back-to-back Super Bowls. Then they compare the Eli Manning pass to Mario Manningham to the Matthew Stafford pass to Cooper Kupp; and they finish up being joined by the Los Angeles Rams Super Bowl winning safety Eric Weddle and he describes the past 60 days of his life; he shares how he pushed through his injury in the Super Bowl; and then he finishes up talking about the Rams leadership.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
